upcoming.details:
We have opened our First-Year Rep applications for the 2024-2025 team

The Toronto Metropolitan Computer Science Course Union (CSCU) is looking for 2 (possibly more ğŸ‘€) qualified candidates to represent and be the voice of the First-Year students.

The CSCU primarily represents Computer Science students in the department. In addition, we organize a variety of academic, career, and social events to assist students ğŸ“š. By joining the CSCU, you will expand your network within and outside of TMU. Many of our members have gained positions at companies such as Amazon, Google, Shopify, Tesla, Coursera, and more as a result. Apply to the CSCU and help us transform TMU CS into a student-driven department ğŸ’ª!

past.details:
